package.name: PowerTap 13
package.shortDescription: Tap the powerknob to cycle between different options

descriptionlist.description:
Features:
* Powerdown confirmation alert to ensure that it wasn't a mistake.
* Tap the knob for a respring option (more options to come).
* No lockscreen autolock.
* Powerdown screen cancel fade out instead of locking (not working that well, may still have to open another app or lock the device).

SOON:
* Options to disable custom cancel animation and no autolock from settings! BUGS WILL EXIST!
